title: Moyeu (for Hubway)
summary: The best way to enjoy Boston's bike sharing system.
description: Visualize the location of every station of Boston's Hubway (http://thehubway.com) bike sharing system with realtime bike and rack availability for each of them.You can also consult your Hubway rental history, add favorite stations for quick access, monitor a station history and see a street view of the spot.It also ships with an Android Wear app, just say "begin a cycle" or "stop a cycle" to see an optimized version of stations state around you on your watch.Moyeu is open-source, code available at: https://github.com/garuma/Moyeu
descriptionHTML:
Visualize the location of every station of Boston's Hubway (http://thehubway.com) bike sharing system with realtime bike and rack availability for each of them.

You can also consult your Hubway rental history, add favorite stations for quick access, monitor a station history and see a street view of the spot.

It also ships with an Android Wear app, just say "begin a cycle" or "stop a cycle" to see an optimized version of stations state around you on your watch.

Moyeu is open-source, code available at: https://github.com/garuma/Moyeu
comments: Is this open source Would love to contribute by fixing common crashes and adding navigation feature
The app stopped showing up any station information about a week ago...
Not working Nothing shown in the map
Not showing anything on the map?
Wonderful interface, wear is a fantastic addition.
Simple, easy, quick app that just works Yet to find out if the bike and rack counts are accurate but the app is simple and smooth
